title: SetBACnetTime2Property (Method)
text:
METHOD SetBACnetTime2Property
Sets the Time-Value of the specified Property (propID) of this BACnet-Object using a CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_TIME struct.
The used functions are no client, meaning, that the access of the property is not restricted by write or read access restrictions.

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment: The ID of the property to set.

rows: The TIME value to set for the property.
